channel.title: tools on Karun Ramakrishnan
channel.description: Recent content in tools on Karun Ramakrishnan

item.title: Tools of the trade - Intellij IDEA - Part 1
item.description: This is a multipart series where I want to show you what tools I use every day and some of my favorite tricks. If you would like to know anything specific or if you know any tricks, do reach out to me. I feel developers need to get really good at using tools. I started off using Eclipse, but eventually got over it and started using Intellij IDEA. I have been a Vim guy and have not had a chance to learn Emacs.
